extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of VMware Carbon Black App Control.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patches from VMware Website
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the appropriate patches for the affected versions of VMware Carbon Black App Control from the VMware website.
